thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-‍National Stores Inc says customers notified of data security incident

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍National Stores Inc says customers notified of data security incident
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) -
* ‍NATIONAL STORES, INC - HAS BEEN VICTIM OF A MALWARE ATTACK, ENABLING UNAUTHORIZED PARTIES TO ACCESS PAYMENT CARD INFORMATION​
* NATIONAL STORES, INC - ‍COMPANY CONTACTED FBI ABOUT “CRIMINAL ACTIVITY”​
* NATIONAL STORES, INC-SAYS AFFECTED PAYMENT CARD INFORMATION MAY HAVE INCLUDED NAMES, PAYMENT CARD NUMBERS, EXPIRATION DATES, AND SECURITY CODES
* NATIONAL STORES INC- ‍BASED ON INVESTIGATION APPEARS PAYMENT CARDS USED AT SOME STORES LOCATIONS BETWEEN JULY 16 AND DEC 11, 2017 MAY BE INVOLVED​ Source text for Eikon:
